member.name: T:XBEL.Info
member.summary: Stores program specific information for a bookmark.

member.name: F:XBEL.Info.Metadata
member.summary: Store the Metadata items for the current bookmark element. These are stored as a string containing raw XML. This is done to preserve the contents for application specific manipulation.

member.name: P:XBEL.Info.Empty
member.summary: Is true if there is no metadata.

member.name: M:XBEL.Info.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Load the information from an XMLReader

member.name: M:XBEL.Info.Load(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Loads new data into this instance
